snippet: Mr. Sirmans is currently the department head and curator of contemporary art at the Los Angeles County Museum of Art.
abstract: Brett Sokol Inside Art column; Franklin Sirmans, current department head and curator of Los Angeles County Museum of Art, begins new position as museum director of Perez Art Museum Miami in October 2015 and will make fundraising a priority; Museum of Moving Image in Queens hosts exhibit Walkers: Hollywood Afterlives in Art and Artifacts, group show of paintings, drawings and other non-moving works inspired by Hollywood films.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Sirmans is currently the department head and curator of contemporary art at the Los Angeles County Museum of Art.
